changelogversion.changelogimprovement: We added the option to take an image for a specific barcode in retrospect rather than just being able to assign a photo to the last barcode. Long-press a barcode to do so.
changelogversion.changelogimpreovement: We've got a new logo! Isn't it pretty? Along with the new logo, we've slightly changed the app's theme, i.e. colours will be slightly different.

changelogversion.changelogtext: It's been a while, but we didn't forget you. Here's a new update that includes a big new feature.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Support for multiple datasets: You can now switch between multiple datasets without having to export and reset the database first. So you can have one dataset using the phenotyping mode and another one using the image tagging mode. Switch between datasets in the side menu.
changelogversion.changelogbug: A number of bugs have been fixed in this release.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: We've set up a shiny new website for Germinate Scan. Why not go and check it out? [a href="https://ics.hutton.ac.uk/get-germinate-scan"]https://ics.hutton.ac.uk/get-germinate-scan[/a]

changelogversion.changelogtext: Finally, a big update! Hooray! And it's a good one.
Completely rewrote About screen to bring it in line with Buntata.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added an introduction screen that will explain the features to new users and guide them through the process of setting everything up.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed Google Map not showing up.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Introduced new phenotyping mode. You can pre-load traits and Germinate Scan will automatically fill them in while you're out phenotyping.
Added the option to open scanned URLs in the browser.

changelogversion.changelogtext: Long time no see. About time for a new release...
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added new export format options to the settings dialog.
Added option to send exported data by e-mail.
Added runtime permission support for Android Marshmallow.

changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed grid view not adapting to newly selected column number.
changelogversion.changelogtext: Updated barcode scanning library. Requires LESS permissions now. Now that's something you don't see very often...
Main view is now based on a grid rather than a list.
changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Association of images with individual barcodes is now possible.
Deletion of individual barcodes by long clicking is now possible.
Added image activity that shows images associated with barcodes (long click barcode).
Added ripple animation to main list view on Lollipop.
Added voice feedback. Text-to-speech (TTS) is used to read out scanned barcodes.
Added example to export format view.
changelogversion.changelogbug: Fixed TTS not working when using internal camera.

changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added option to delete last barcode.
Added option to make the map not follow user location.
changelogversion.changelogtext: Map now zooms in on start to show markers.

changelogversion.changelogimprovement: Added initial Material Design theme.
Added export format options.
Added more options for tagging images.
Added link to online help documentation.
Added missing image resources.
Added option to switch between satellite and map view on Google Maps.
